data.previewFullScreenMenu (for demo): This is a preview of the full screen menu whether it's visible or not and is really only used for the purposes of this demo.
data.previewFullScreenMenu: This will toggle the fullscreen menu to be open or closed.

additional.description: You will most likely only want the content inside of the <template x-teleport="body"> section. The other content outside of this element are for demo purposes.
